delete_team_directory: Delete team's directory at team deletion
empty_selected_teams_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to empty the selected team(s) ?
fill_selected_teams_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to fill the selected team(s) with users who are registered in no team ?
max_teams: Number of teams allowed by user
register_to_team_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to register to this team ?
unregister_from_team_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to unregister from this team ?
user_creatable_resources: Resources that can be created by users
self_registration_help: Users will be able to register themselves to the team.
self_unregistration_help: Users will be able to unregister themselves from the team.
